segments.text: I am shocked by the mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the woman is just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even seem to notice the water all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children sneaking cookies, completely unaware of the water hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless they all are being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, not caring about the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really clean up this mess and teach them to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just disgusting to see such a lack of awareness and responsibility.
segments.speaker: PAR
